it.apice.sapere.api - package it.apice.sapere.api
This package is the root of all SAPERE system interfaces.
it.apice.sapere.api.internal - package it.apice.sapere.api.internal
This package contains internal entities that will not be provided outside the bundle.
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas - package it.apice.sapere.api.lsas
This package contains the definition of a Live Semantic Annotation (LSA) and relatives.
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values - package it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values
This package contains the definition of property values supported types.
it.apice.sapere.api.nodes - package it.apice.sapere.api.nodes
This package contains the definition of SAPERE nodes and agents.
it.apice.sapere.api.space - package it.apice.sapere.api.space
This package contains LSA-space interfaces.
it.apice.sapere.space - package it.apice.sapere.space
...
it.apice.sapere.space.impl - package it.apice.sapere.space.impl
This package contains the implementation of the services required to handle an LSA-space.

L

LiteralValue - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values
Interface that represents a String (literal) value that can be associated to a property.
LongValue - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values
Interface that represents a long value that can be associated to a property.
LSA - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas
This interface models an LSA: Live Semantic Annotation.
LSAid - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas
This interface models an LSA-id which is a unique system-wide key used to identify an LSA.
LSAidValue - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values
Interface that represents an LSA-id value that can be associated to a property.
LSAspace - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.space
This interface models an LSA-space (local) as seen by a SAPEREAgent, so capable of storing and retrieve LSAs whenever needed.

O

Starts observing the specified LSA.
OnErrorAction - Enum in it.apice.sapere.api.nodes
This enumeration provides a set of action that the system should execute on an agent which is in error state.

SAPEREAgent - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.nodes
This interface models a SAPERE Agent running on a specific node.
SAPEREAgentBehaviour - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.nodes
This interface is meant to be implemented in order to model a SAPERE ecosystem agent.
SAPEREException - Exception in it.apice.sapere.api.nodes
Generic error class that will be adopted in the model to remark that something doesn't fit model requirements.

SAPEREFactory - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api
A SAPEREFactory provides basic functionalities that enables the creation of all entities that compose the SAPERE model.
SAPERENode - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.nodes
This interface models a generic SAPERE node, part of an ecosystem.
SAPEREParser - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api
A SAPEREParser provides basic functionalities that enables the creation of LSAs from a description.
SAPEREParserJenaImpl - Class in it.apice.sapere.space.impl
This class provides an implementation of the SAPEREParser which relies on Jena Framework.
SAPEREParserJenaImpl() - Constructor for class it.apice.sapere.space.impl.SAPEREParserJenaImpl
 
SemanticDescription - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas
A Semantic Description is a collection of properties that are associated to the LSA containing the description.
SpaceObservationEvent - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.space
This interface models an observation event occurred in the LSA-space.
SpaceOperationType - Enum in it.apice.sapere.api.space
Defines the type of operation that has been observed (on the LSA-space).
spawn() - Method in interface it.apice.sapere.api.nodes.SAPEREAgent
Start the agent.

U

update(LSA) - Method in interface it.apice.sapere.api.space.LSAspace

THIS CLASS HAS BEEN CREATED DESPITE THE SAPERE MODEL, BECAUSE HANDLING RDF A URI DATA TYPE COULD BE USEFUL.
